basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Back-End Engineer
basics.summary: Highly skilled Back-End Engineer with 3+ years of experience in designing and developing server-side applications using Node.js, Python, and MongoDB. Proficient in API integration, object-oriented programming, and version control with Git. Passionate about building scalable backend solutions and collaborating in Agile environments.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Engineered backend solutions and AI-powered applications using Python, Node.js, Express.js, and OpenAI APIs while collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop scalable server-side logic.
highlights: Developed backend services for AI-powered browser extension (AdCognition) using TypeScript and TensorFlow.js for real-time processing
Built RoboGPT, an Nvidia Isaac Sim extension integrating LLMs and OpenAI APIs for server-side natural language processing and robot control
Collaborated on code reviews and system design to ensure robust API functionality and data management

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Contributed as a back-end developer in building the AdsMedia full-stack retargeting platform using Node.js, TypeScript, and database solutions for campaign management.
highlights: Architected and developed backend components for dashboard and form functionalities, focusing on server-side logic and data handling
Integrated RESTful APIs to enable smooth data flow between frontend and backend services
Applied object-oriented programming principles to ensure scalable and maintainable server-side applications

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Developed automation solutions using JavaScript to enhance operational efficiency.
highlights: Developed Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software utilizing RegEx for automating form-filling and email generation, improving team efficiency
Demonstrated problem-solving skills through innovative scripting for backend-like automation tasks

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated backend processes for form-filling and email generation

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: Full-stack social media application with backend developed using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB to handle server-side logic, APIs, and data persistence.
highlights: Implemented server-side application using Express.js framework for RESTful API endpoints and user authentication
Managed non-relational database solutions with MongoDB to store and retrieve user data efficiently
Applied software design principles and object-oriented programming for scalable backend architecture

projects.name: defender-bot
projects.description: Python-controlled LEGO Mindstorms robot demonstrating proficiency in server-side programming with Python, OOP principles, and sensor data handling.

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: Nvidia Isaac Sim extension for robot control via natural language, utilizing OpenAI APIs for backend integration and processing.
